name: Alternate (Somnyr)
description:
A virus is corrupting the computer, and you, little data, must to run away to save your "life".

But you have to dodging traps and bugs if you don't want to be erased before your goal.

Jump and change side to avoid traps.

Tap Spacebar to jump.

Double-tap Spacebar to change side.

You have three lives but you can gather other lives on your way. 

Game Designer / Level Designer : Aurelien Meunier

Programmer : Nathan Girod

2D artist : David Brunel

Sound searcher :

Sound : https://freesound.org

Music : Rising tides faster by Kevin MacLeod https://filmmusic.io/song/5028-rising-tide-faster

Made with love in 72h, for the GeoJam 2022 (theme : "Pick a side")
